特記事項: 【合併】English Communication IV　Ａ（総合政策学部）/英語コミュニケーションIV　Ａ（総合政策学部）
授業方法: Materials, instruction, and all class communication are in English. Course materials will be available to students through LUNA.

トピック.授業計画1:
*All 14 classes will be conducted face-to-face.
 <Reading> Students practice reading skills and read and discuss a variety of policy-related texts in English. 

<Seminar> Students will develop an ability to discuss a topic with a group. The topics will challenge students to think beyond their experiences and cultural influences.
トピック.授業外学習2:
<Reading> Students read short articles, and complete language development activities. They read for fluency on XReading and in their Reading for Speed ​​and Fluency books. 

<Seminar> Students read articles and discuss them in class. Students learn vocabulary, ask discussion questions, and use discussion skills. Students find information on the Internet evaluate it.
